agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Urban Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, March 7, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Angie Button The Committee will meet to hear first invited testimony and then proceed with public testimony on the following: HB 304 Paul Relating to the governance and operation of municipal management districts. HB 715 Ortega Relating to the authority of certain municipalities to foreclose a lien on property to recover certain expenses. HB 747 Stucky Relating to the authority of certain municipalities to propose a fire control, prevention, and emergency medical services district. HB 951 Stucky Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
